verses.verse: And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Shittim <S%H7851><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, he and all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and lodged <S%H3885><s%> there before they passed over <S%H5674><s%>.
And it came to pass after <S%H7097><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that the officers <S%H7860><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>;

And they commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, When ye see <S%H7200><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> it, then ye shall remove <S%H5265><s%> from your place <S%H4725><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> it.

Yet there shall be a space <S%H7350><s%> between you and it, about two thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> by measure <S%H4060><s%>: come not near <S%H7126><s%> unto it, that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> by which ye must go <S%H3212><s%>: for ye have not passed <S%H5674><s%> this way <S%H1870><s%> heretofore <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves: for to morrow <S%H4279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6381><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto the priests <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and pass over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>. And they took up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, This day <S%H3117><s%> will I begin <S%H2490><s%> to magnify <S%H1431><s%> thee in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that, as I was with Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so I will be with thee.

And thou shalt command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, When ye are come <S%H935><s%> to the brink <S%H7097><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, ye shall stand still <S%H5975><s%> in Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

¶ And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Come hither <S%H5066><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Hereby ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, and that he will without fail <S%H3423><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Girgashites <S%H1622><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>.
Behold, the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%> passeth over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you into Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

Now therefore take <S%H3947><s%> you twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, out of every <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, as soon as the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>, shall rest <S%H5117><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%> that come down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4605><s%>; and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> upon an <S%H259><s%> heap <S%H5067><s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when the people <S%H5971><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> from their tents <S%H168><s%>, to pass over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>;

And as they that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were come <S%H935><s%> unto Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were dipped <S%H2881><s%> in the brim <S%H7097><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%>, (for Jordan <S%H3383><s%> overfloweth <S%H4390><s%> all his banks <S%H1415><s%> all the time <S%H3117><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>,)

That the waters <S%H4325><s%> which came down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4605><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> and rose up <S%H6965><s%> upon an <S%H259><s%> heap <S%H5067><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> Adam <S%H121><s%>, that is beside <S%H6654><s%> Zaretan <S%H6891><s%>: and those that came down <S%H3381><s%> toward the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the plain <S%H6160><s%>, even the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, failed <S%H8552><s%>, and were cut off <S%H3772><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> right against Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> firm <S%H3559><s%> on dry ground <S%H2724><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and all the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> on dry ground <S%H2724><s%>, until all the people <S%H1471><s%> were passed <S%H5674><s%> clean <S%H8552><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.
